roleset.name: add zest to
roleset.note: SAUCE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class fill-9.8. No framenet class. Framed by Katie. (from sauce.01-v)

roles.note: This does not apply solely to food. (from sauce.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Cook for the longer time if [the pasta]-1 is to be sauced *trace*-1 and eaten immediately.

example.name: passive with both arg 1 and 2
example.text: [Thin, tender ravioli]-1 was sauced *trace*-1 in a delicate cream flecked with lemon zest.
example.arg: in a delicate cream flecked with lemon zest.

roleset.name: be saucy! (sassy)
roleset.note: SAUCE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet class. Framed by Katie. (from sauce.02-v)

example.name: Example with all arguments
example.text: [Bare-breasted beauties *1] parade around the stage, wiggling, sighing, shaking, and [ * 1]saucing the house
